text: Would it be possible for the JuliaHub registration form to look for both a master and main branch and default to main if master is not found?

elements.text: Would it be possible for the JuliaHub registration form to look for both a master and main branch and default to main if master is not found?

text: Seems like a good idea. We don't clone the repo until after the form is submitted, so it might need some work to figure out the ideal workflow here.

elements.text: Seems like a good idea. We don't clone the repo until after the form is submitted, so it might need some work to figure out the ideal workflow here.

text: Could just call it `default` and look for either
